title: SignalStore for State Management
summary: Adopted NgRx SignalStore for signal-first reactive state management with minimal boilerplate, entity management features, and seamless RxJS integration via rxMethod().

title: Mock Auth with Strategy Pattern
summary: Implemented Strategy pattern for authentication with MockAuthStrategy as default provider, demonstrating SOLID principles and enabling easy swap to real auth providers (OAuth2, SAML).

title: Component Library Architecture
summary: Built custom component library with 30+ standalone components using signal inputs, BEM CSS methodology, OnPush change detection, and WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility standards.

title: Theming System Design
summary: Implemented CSS custom properties theming with six named themes (light, dark, and high-contrast variants), system preference detection, and runtime theme switching without JavaScript overhead.

title: Error Handling Strategy
summary: Created defense-in-depth error handling with global ErrorHandler for uncaught exceptions, HTTP interceptor for API errors, normalized AppError interface, and ErrorNotificationService for user feedback.

title: Analytics Strategy Pattern
summary: Implemented Strategy pattern for analytics with AnalyticsProvider interface, enabling swappable implementations (Console vs Google Analytics) and clean environment-based switching.

title: SEO Management Approach
summary: Centralized SEO management via SeoService to handle Title, Meta Tags, Open Graph, Twitter Cards, and Canonical URLs consistently across all routes.

title: I18n Strategy with Transloco
summary: Adopted Transloco for internationalization to enable runtime language switching, lazy-loading of translation files, and structural directive optimization for performance.

title: Testing Strategy
summary: Standardized on Vitest for high-speed unit/integration testing and Playwright for robust E2E testing, with an 85% code coverage threshold requirement.

title: CI/CD Pipeline Architecture
summary: Established comprehensive GitHub Actions pipeline with parallelized linting, testing, building, CodeQL security scanning, Lighthouse audits, and automated deployment.

title: Lazy Loading & Code Splitting
summary: Implemented route-level code splitting using modern Angular standalone component lazy loading to minimize initial bundle size and improve load performance.

title: Form Management Pattern
summary: Mandated Reactive Forms combined with custom ControlValueAccessor components for consistent validation logic, immutability, and full testability of complex forms.

title: Logging & Monitoring Strategy
summary: Abstracted logging via LoggerService to provide environment-aware severity filtering, context enrichment, and future-proof destination swapping (e.g., Sentry).

title: Strict Layering with ESLint
summary: Enforced strict architectural boundaries using eslint-plugin-boundaries to prevent circular dependencies and ensure unidirectional data flow (Core -> Shared -> Features).

title: Documentation Tooling Strategy
summary: Adopted hybrid documentation strategy: Storybook for UI components, Compodoc for code structure, and Markdown ADRs for architectural decisions.

title: Git Workflow & Standards
summary: Enforced Conventional Commits standard via Husky hooks and Commitlint to automate changelog generation and maintain a clean, readable project history.

title: Package Management
summary: Standardized on npm with strict lockfile (package-lock.json) usage and automated vulnerability auditing to ensure reproducible and secure builds.
